"<%me>!<br>Perfect timing!<br>Right this:
"Time to collect some more data from Earth!
We're just gathering information, okay?
Strictly information, and nothing more!"

"It's a bit difficult to get a full grasp of
things if we're only observing the girl's
side, right?"

"So this time we'll check out things on Aru
and Enga's end, alright?"

"So let's have a look and see how
things are going on Earth!"

"Ahahah! It's so big! Sooo big!
This bath's reeeaaally really comfy, isn't it?
Big bro?"

"I won't deny that, but...
Any sense of relaxation
has already been ruined."
"Ho now! Such a scary face, my boy."

"You're an Earth Sciences lecturer.
I was here, and thought a bath would be nice.
You, on the other hand, just waltzed in right after
me as if you practically owned the place!"

"What gives, Hagith Anie?!
All you're doing is making things awkward!"

"How rude! I do practically own the place, as I've
become one of this fine establishment's significant
financial backers post-graduation! Have a little
respect for your benefactor!"

"Do you have any idea how annoying you sound?
We shouldn't have to put up with your arrogance."

"That's why I'm expressing my apologies
in the form of more than generous donations!
Think of it as...corporate philanthropy."

"It wouldn't hurt for me to spend a night
in the dorms just for old times' sake,
would it?"

"I do apologize. Joining Mother Cluster
failed to take the immaturity out of him."

"N-no need for apologies, Gramps.
...Geez."

"But it's good if everybody's together and
lively, right? \"The more the merrier,\" right?"

"I'd be happy if big sis and
everybody else could join too!"

"You dummy! That's a recipe for
disaster in a steaming hot pot."

"But we went in
together last time..."
"What?!"
"Tell me more!"
"Out of it, old grad!"

"How rude! Healthy young men
of our age should be curious
about this stuff, shouldn't we?"

"We're in the mens' room,
there's no need to hold back!"

"Hmm... Come to think of it, Enga...
You were trying to tease Och,
weren't you?"
"Y-you're on about that, old man?"

"Of course!
You prefer tiny tits, don't you?"

"I didn't even put it remotely like that!
Watch your language around the kid!"

"Big bro, what are tiny tits?
What are they? Tell me, tell me!"

"Oh, how troublesome could this get--
Oh! Like Hitsugi! A breast size like hers.
Where you try to feel around, but there's,
like, nothing there."

"Huh?
But big sis's were all, \"boing!\""
"Y-you're kidding me!"

"Kohri's were more amazing, though!
All, \"bo-yo-yoing!\""

"Ho, ho! I must agree that Kohri's
growth is the more fascinating.
Extraordinarily eye-catching..."

"You shouldn't even be talking
about this stuff, ya ol' pervert!"

"Heheh! Now that's my idea of a men's conversation!
Aah... I've always wanted to talk about these things
with my peers back in school!"

"You were one lonely dastard in school...
No wonder you became the student council president."
"Well, I was the best one for the job!"
"Aaand now I'm reminded of why I hate you."

"So, Enga...
What IS your type, really?
Big? Small?"

"Personally, I accept all of their glory!
No matter the size, they each have their charms.
Big or small, neither is greater than the other!"

"Oh, zip it!
Don't ramble if you're not the one being asked!"

"But to choose between Hitsugi or Kohri...
Oh, I'd have to pick Kohri."
"Someone's got guts, doesn't he?"

"Oh, so you do like tiny tits?
So you were just teasing Och, then?
Well, how about we use my latest app
to ensure you both get along..."
"Alright, you've got a death wish now."

"What do you think, Aru?
If you've felt Hitsugi's and Kohri's,
which do you prefer?"

"Hmm... I don't really follow, but...
I like hugging them."

"Kohri's made my heart skip,
and it was kind of weird...
But they're so warm. I like them both!"

"I know, right?!
You agree with me!"

"Don't go perverting Aru's
innocent mind like that!"

"Ho, ho! Such energetic youth...
But events like these embody peace.
Right... Mother?"

"Wah! S-s-sorry, I was, uh...
Lost in my own little world there!"

"Everybody seems to be perfectly A-O.K.,
so we are done here! Mhmm!
No more information needed!"

"No! More! ...And don't worry, I will be
keeping this footage STRICTLY confidential!"
